nodes.text: A Nightbrother village was a village where the Dathomirian Zabrak warrior group, Nightbrothers and their domesticated bane back spiders, lived and trained on their homeworld of Dathomir. It was built into the Upper Strangled Cliffs. The Nightbrothers moved in after their first village was destroyed during the Second Battle of Dathomir in 19 BBY. In 14 BBY, the Jedi Padawan Cal Kestis visited the village.
The Nightbrother village appeared in the 2019 video game, Star Wars Jedi: Fallen Order which was published by Respawn Entertainment.
